reviews.review_text: Urizen Shadows of the Cold appears to be an interesting game based off of lore described on its Steam store page. It is presented well. However, this game implements 8-bit style graphics. While this can be done well, it was done poorly in this situation. It is butt-ugly. This game also does not allow keyboards to be used. This game is on the PC and should be able to do so. I do not own a joystick. As such, gameplay was not decent and the controls were very unintuitive. The music is present and seems to be decent, but I was only able to listen to the start menu music. This game does count towards number of steam games and has trading cards. As such, I would pay 50 cents for the game.   If you are reading this and are the developer, please add keyboard controls. I do want to try this game.  Note: I recieved a key for this game in a giveaway.
Total trash.  You can run game but you can't play it. Had to wait in games so that I can write this review.  Save yourself.  Hidden!
I dont know if i should put you through the suffering but plug in a controller to be able to play....but please, dont blame me for what happens next...im sorry...so sorry...
